channel.title: Need Tut For membership
channel.description: Can anybody find it? I couldn't all that came up was Runescape Membership, thanks!

item.title: Need Tut For membership
item.dc:creator: @chacito777 chacito777
item.description:
@chacito777 wrote:

[quote=“spleen15, post:6, topic:168865”]well there is any easy way to do it. make these rights:
0=non member
1=member
2=mod
3=admin
4=owner

and for the barrows command or tele or whatever add a &&playerrights>1 or whatever it is. I don’t have anything with servers on this computer sorry[/quote]
not in character rights, 0 reg, 1 mod, 2 admin, 3 owner, 4 undercover admin

item.title: Need Tut For membership
item.dc:creator: @PLAYTIME PLAYTIME
item.description:
@PLAYTIME wrote:

goblin k.o:

what do you mean , you need membership?

Im adding it for like only members can wear this, or goto barrows, but i need the codes to add membership.

[quote=“Java Is My Bitch™, post:3, topic:168865”]To make sure no-one gets free membership:

search:

outStream.writeByteA(1);

Change the 1 to a 0.

Just to be clear where that is located:

Search this first:

public void initialize()

Then the outStream.

That’s all i know. Why do you want membership anyways?[/quote]
I need like the codes to add. Im adding for like only members can goto barrows.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Tut For membership
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

Make a check members boolean that checks if your in the list or not

That would be an examle you also need the boolean shouldn’t be hard to make :rolleyes:
if(checkmembers() == false){
sendMessage(“NOOB”);
}

item.title: Need Tut For membership

item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

To make sure no-one gets free membership:

search:

outStream.writeByteA(1);

Change the 1 to a 0.

Just to be clear where that is located:

Search this first:

public void initialize()

Then the outStream.

That’s all i know. Why do you want membership anyways?
